overview: Sarah (Zelda Coleborn) goes on a late night out and drives home drunk. On the journey home she gets into an accident with a pedestrian. The film entails Sarah's revealing of the events to her two friends Scott (Oscar Blakeborough) and Mike (Nat Tomkins). However, due to Sarah's vague telling of the event and Scott and Mike's differing personalities their interpretations of the events are different.
tagline: When you get hit by a car, nobody knows what happened
title: Forked Roads
